projects.title: Semantic Enrichment for Text Summarization
projects.description: Developed an AI-driven system to improve the quality of text summarization for biomedical literature, focusing on extracting key insights while preserving semantic meaning for better knowledge representation in research papers.

projects.title: AI-based Text Summarization
projects.description: Implemented an AI-powered tool that uses the PICO framework to summarize medical articles, helping researchers and clinicians quickly extract important information from lengthy medical texts.

projects.title: Farmer's Buddy
projects.description: Built a platform that provides personalized crop recommendations using AI, enabling farmers to make data-driven decisions based on soil type, weather, and crop suitability for better yield management.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Designed a personal portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and achievements, built with responsive design principles to ensure optimal viewing across devices and enhance professional branding.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Developed a full-stack e-commerce platform featuring secure user authentication, shopping cart functionality, and payment gateway integration for a seamless online shopping experience.

projects.title: Chat Application
projects.description: Created a real-time chat application using Socket.io and Node.js, allowing users to engage in instant messaging with features like rooms and live updates for interactive communication.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: Designed a responsive web app that provides real-time weather updates, with intuitive user interfaces and location-based services to offer accurate weather data for any region.

projects.title: Task Manager
projects.description: Developed a web-based task management tool with drag-and-drop features, enabling users to organize tasks efficiently and track progress with a modern and easy-to-use interface.

projects.title: Blog Platform
projects.description: Built a fully functional blogging platform with rich text editing, user authentication, and content management features, enabling users to create, edit, and publish blogs with ease.

projects.title: Fitness Tracker
projects.description: Created a mobile-responsive web app to track fitness activities, set goals, and monitor progress over time, featuring user-friendly interfaces and personalized fitness recommendations.

projects.title: Recipe Finder
projects.description: Developed a recipe search platform that allows users to search for and save their favorite recipes with user-friendly navigation and filtering options for customized meal planning.

projects.title: Travel Planner
projects.description: Built a travel planning tool with itinerary management, hotel and flight booking integration, and trip scheduling features, providing users with a streamlined way to organize and manage trips.

projects.title: Photo Gallery
projects.description: Created an interactive photo gallery featuring filtering, lightbox effects, and responsive design, allowing users to view and navigate through photo collections with enhanced visual experiences.

projects.title: Expense Tracker
projects.description: Developed a budget management tool to help users track expenses, categorize spending, and generate financial reports for more effective budgeting and financial planning.

projects.title: Language Learning App
projects.description: Built a web app to help users learn new languages with interactive lessons, quizzes, and progress tracking, enhancing the language learning process with engaging and personalized content.

projects.title: Virtual Reality Tour
projects.description: Designed a virtual reality tour system for real estate, offering immersive 3D experiences to potential buyers, enabling them to explore properties from the comfort of their homes.

projects.title: Music Player
projects.description: Developed a responsive web-based music player featuring playlist management, song search functionalities, and sleek UI/UX, allowing users to enjoy music seamlessly across devices.

projects.title: Stock Market Tracker
projects.description: Created a real-time stock market tracker to monitor indices, stock prices, and trends, providing users with data visualization tools and personalized alerts for informed investment decisions.

projects.title: Event Scheduler
projects.description: Built an event scheduling tool with calendar integrations, allowing users to organize and track events efficiently with reminders, invitations, and real-time updates.

projects.title: Chatbot Integration
projects.description: Implemented intelligent chatbot systems into websites to enhance user interactions with automated responses, improving customer engagement and providing instant support.
